title: Sept 1st ByOwner Davis Sq Tufts X-Lg 4 Bedroom 2 Bath You'll love it!
neighborhood: Many Extras! Easy to Harvard, MIT, MGH, Tufts, Boston
posting_body: By Owner.
No Fee.
Available September 1st for a one year lease
Absolutely fabulous two level, 2,400 sf apartment on the 2nd and 3rd floors of a magnificent two family home!
Spacious interior.
All large bedrooms.
Hardwood floors.
Two full bathrooms.
Front and rear porches.
Front porch overlooks the Powder House Park.
Includes separate, no-charge, washing machine and dryer just for this apartment.
Exceptional location!
This home is about a 9 to 10 minute walk to Davis Square and the Red Line T. Going to Cambridge or Boston from Davis Square is very easy.
We're about a three minute walk to the new Green Line Extension which will be opening in Ball Square later this year.
We're a one minute walk to the bus stop on Broadway for the #89 bus which in about 12 minutes will take you to the Orange Line T Station in Sullivan Square.
From there it's only a few stops to State Street and the Financial District, Downtown Crossing and Tufts New England Medical Center.
And it's jus a short walk to Tufts University.
<URL> rates this a 93 Walk Score =
Walker's Paradise
<URL> rates this a 98 Bike Score =
Biker's Paradise
Across the street from our home is the Powder House Park, a pleasant park with lots of trees and small, grassy rolling hills.
The park helps create a beautiful and friendly location.

You'll find people enjoying the park with an afternoon lunch, early morning Tai Chi, frisbee, strolling along with a baby carriage, walking their dog, reading on a park bench, or just catching some sun.
In the winter it's great to see the little kids sled down the small hills.
It's a very spacious, comfortable home in very good condition with lots of amenities.
This is a very clean home and a quiet home.
It's a pleasure to live here!
Please introduce yourself and your roommates and include what you'll be doing.
Feel free to include a link to your social media.
In any event, more than a one line reply is appreciated.
No smoking.
No drama.
